name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_158Eu
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Eu" means the element "europium" and "158Eu" is the isotope "europium-158" with a half-life of 3.18e-02 days.
